Episodes.Title: Caveland
Episodes.Plot:
Little Murray invents an air cooler.
Dorothy?s Dance Class teaches The Airplane.
A bunch of musical numbers including an animated Caveland.Song List
1. Hot Potato
2. Move Your Arms like Henry
3. The Bricklayers Song
4. Here Comes a Chicken
5. Can You (point your fingers and do the twist)?
6. Sailing Around the World
7. Central Park, New York
8. Tick Tock (All Night Long)
9. Caveland

Episodes.Title: Play Your Guitar
Episodes.Plot:
Captain Feathersword hosts his own Greek Olympic games with the crew as his participants.
Dorothy?s Dance class teaches the cha-cha-cha.
Jeff wants to paint Wigglehouse all by himself.  The other Wiggles wonder if he?s up to the task.Song List
1. Can You (point your fingers and do the twist)?
2. Agapame Tin Athena (We Love Athens)
3. Lettuce Sing - Fresh Fruit and Veggies
4. Play your guitar with Murray

Episodes.Title: Big Red Car
Episodes.Plot:
Little Murray invents a pie machine for Little Anthony . Dorothy?s dance class does the elbow dance.Song List
1. Toot Toot
2. Wake Up, Jeff!
3. Central Park, New York
4. Wiggle Groove
5. Rock a bye your bear
6. Hoop Dee Doo - concert
7. Wobbly Camel - animated
8. Picking Flowers

Episodes.Title: London Town!/Fly Through the Sky
Episodes.Plot:
The Wiggles start off with a musical dance challenge.
Captain Feathersword sails to London.
Dorothy?s Dance Class has two segments: Boot Scoot and Kangaroo Dance.
The Wiggles get dressed for a rainy day.
Songs: 
"Can You Point Your Fingers and Do the Twist?"
"London Town"
"We're Dancing with Wags the Dog"
"Fly through the Sky"
"The Monkey Dance"

Episodes.Title: Topsy Turvy/Hats
Episodes.Plot:
Captain Feathersword prepares his ship, the SS Feathersword, to sail to San Francisco.  That means getting supplies together and raincoats for the upcoming storm.
At the Wigglehouse, the Wiggles are all behaving strangely.  Jeff is really hungry, Murray is sleepy, Greg is playing his red guitar, and Anthony is doing magic!
Caterina and Ryan teach the hop.

Song List:
"San Francisco Trolley Car"
"I wave my arms and swing my baton"
"New York Firefighter"
Episodes.Writer: Greg Page, Murray Cook, Anthony Field
